com.isotrol.impe3.pms.gui.client.controllers
Class DevicesController

java.lang.Object
  com.isotrol.impe3.pms.gui.client.controllers.DevicesController
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.ChangeEventSource, com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService, IDevicesServiceAsync
public class DevicesController
extends Object
implements IDevicesServiceAsync, com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.ChangeEventSource

Devices Service proxy decorator with event firing capabilities. Calls to service must be done through this Controller instances.

Author:
Manuel Ruiz
